LanguageData.AS_WHE_BulletProofVest.label: Bulletproof Vest (Half Elf)
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BulletProofVest.description: A simple bulletproof vest made of steel, plasteel and cloth. By mixing plastic steel, it is light and durable.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_MarineArmor.label: Half Elven Marine Armor
LanguageData.AS_WHE_PressureResistantSuits.label: Pressure ResistantSuits
LanguageData.AS_WHE_PressureResistantSuits.descriptio: A suit crafted with advanced technology to enable action in outer space. It's slightly weaker than Marine equipment, but has high heat and cold resistance.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_PlateArmor.label: Half Elven Plate Armor
LanguageData.AS_WHE_PlateArmor.description: Half-elven plate armor made of metal. It protects your neck, torso, shoulders and arms, and is very strong, but a little heavy.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_WAEArmor_Re.label: Ancient Elvish Plate Armor
LanguageData.AS_WHE_WAEArmor_Re.description: A replica of ancient Elven plate armor, recreated with half-elf technology. Uranium is used, and the overall finish is black. It not only boasts high defensive power, but also has the effect of enhancing the wearer's close combat ability.
